tool_description: You can use it to retrieve data from LinkedIn and integrate it into your application or platform. The API allows you to access a wide range of data, including user profiles, company profiles, job postings, and more. Get started at https://linkifyAPI.com today!
title: Linkedin Live Data

api_list.name: Industries List
api_list.description: Retrieve the list of industries applicable for utilization on the search endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://linkedin-live-data.p.rapidapi.com/company-industries"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "linkedin-live-data.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Company Types
api_list.description: Get the list of company types to use in company_type search filter.

api_list.name: Get Company Details
api_list.description: You can use this endpoint to get details for companies LinkedIn profiles.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://linkedin-live-data.p.rapidapi.com/profile-details"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "linkedin-live-data.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
